GS40yrasprpu:593: mukhasthaṃ kurute samyak dṛḍhavajrasamaṃ vapuḥ // YRps_2.99 //

GS40yrasprpu:598: raseṃdraḥ kāntalohaṃ ca tīkṣṇalohaṃ tathaiva ca /
GS40yrasprpu:599: abhrasatvaṃ tathā tāpya- satvaṃ hemasamanvitam // YRps_2.102 //
GS40yrasprpu:601: niṣecayedekadinaṃ paścād golaṃ tu kārayet // YRps_2.103 //
GS40yrasprpu:603: gojihvā kākamācī ca nirguṃḍī dugdhikā tathā // YRps_2.104 //
GS40yrasprpu:607: vaktre dhṛtaṃ jarāmṛtyuṃ nihanti ca na saṃśayaḥ // YRps_2.106 //
GS40yrasprpu:609: karṇe kaṇṭhe tathā haste dhāritā mastake'pi vā /
GS40yrasprpu:612: kurvanti ye tattvavido bhiṣagvarā rājñāṃ gṛhe te'pi bhavanti pūjyāḥ //
GS40yrasprpu:613: iti paramarahasyaṃ sūtarājasya coktaṃ rasanigamamahābdher labdham etat suratnam /
GS40yrasprpu:614: sakalaguṇavariṣṭhā vādinaḥ kautukajñā nijahṛdi ca sukaṇṭhe dhārayiṣyanti tajjñāḥ // YRps_2.109
GS40yrasprpu:622: supayasā lavaṇena vimarditaṃ kuru bhiṣagvara yantrasurodhanam // YRps_3.3
GS40yrasprpu:624: upari tatra jalena niṣiñcayed iti bhaveddaradād varasūtakaḥ // YRps_3.4 //
GS40yrasprpu:626: bahuladoṣaharo'pi bhavettathā bhavati śuddhatamo daradodbhavaḥ // YRps_3.5
GS40yrasprpu:630: saha jalena vimṛdya ca yāmakaṃ lavaṇakāmlajalena vimiśritāḥ /
GS40yrasprpu:631: uditadhātugaṇasya ca mūṣikāṃ kuru viṣaṃ viniveśaya tatra vai // YRps_3.7
GS40yrasprpu:636: saghanasārarasaḥ kila kāntidas tv akhilakuṣṭhaharaḥ kathito mayā //
GS40yrasprpu:639: praharayugmamitaṃ ca śilātale ravikareṇa vimardya vicūrṇitau // YRps_3.10
GS40yrasprpu:641: kuru bhiṣagvara vahnim adhastataḥ sa ca bhavedaruṇaḥ kamalacchaviḥ //
GS40yrasprpu:643: magadhajāmadhunā saha guñjikā- trayamitaśca sadā parisevitaḥ // YRps_3.12
GS40yrasprpu:645: gadaharo balado'pi hi varṇado bhavati karmavipākajarogahā /
GS40yrasprpu:648: rasavidāpi rasaḥ pariśodhito vigatadoṣakṛto'pi hi gaṃdhakaḥ /
GS40yrasprpu:649: vimalalohamaye kṛtakharpare hy amalasārarajaḥ parimucyatām // YRps_3.14 //
GS40yrasprpu:650: atikuśāgniyute dravati svayaṃ tadanu tatra rasaḥ parimucyatām /
GS40yrasprpu:652: tadanu kācaghaṭīṃ viniveśya vai sikatayantravareṇa hi pācitaḥ /
GS40yrasprpu:654: gatabalena nareṇa susevito bhavati vājikaraḥ sukhadaḥ sadā // YRps_3.17 //
GS40yrasprpu:655: sa ca valīpalitāni vināśayec chataśaratsu nirāmayakṛtparam // YRps_3.18 //
GS40yrasprpu:658: satatameva vimardya śilātale balivasāṃ ca samāṃ kuru tadbhiṣak //
GS40yrasprpu:659: dinamitaṃ suvimardya ca kanyakā- svarasa ainakareṇa viśoṣayet /
GS40yrasprpu:660: tadanu sūtavarasya tu kajjalīṃ rucirakācaghaṭe viniveśaya // YRps_3.20 //
GS40yrasprpu:661: divasayugmamadhaḥ kṛtavahninā sa ca bhavedaruṇaḥ kamalacchaviḥ /
GS40yrasprpu:662: sakalarogavināśanavahnikṛt balakaraḥ paramo'pi hi kāntikṛt // YRps_3.21 //
GS40yrasprpu:664: sa khalu karmavipākajarogahā viśadanāgayutaḥ khalu pāradaḥ // YRps_3.22 //
GS40yrasprpu:666: mṛdumṛdā racitā masṛṇeṣṭikā upari gartavareṇa ca saṃyutā /
GS40yrasprpu:667: rasavaraṃ daśaśāṇamitaṃ hi tat saśukapicchavareṇa nidhāpayet // YRps_3.23
GS40yrasprpu:669: sthagaya taṃ ca pidhānavareṇa vai mṛditayā sumṛdā parimudritam //
GS40yrasprpu:670: tadanu kukkuṭānāṃ puṭe śṛto hupalakena vanodbhavakena vai /
GS40yrasprpu:671: vidhividā bhiṣajā hyamunā kṛto vimalaṣaḍguṇagandhakam aśnute // YRps_3.25
GS40yrasprpu:672: sa ca śarīrakaro'pyatha lohakṛt sakalasiddhikaraḥ paramo bhavet /
GS40yrasprpu:673: śataguṇaṃ hi yadā parijīryate rasavaraḥ khalu hemakaro bhavet // YRps_3.26
GS40yrasprpu:675: saśukapicchasamo'pi hi pārado bhavati khalvatalena ca kuṭṭitaḥ /
GS40yrasprpu:677: upari nāgarasena vilepitā ravikareṇa sadā pariśoṣitām /
GS40yrasprpu:678: kanakapatrarasena ca saptadhāpy avanigartatale viniveśaya // YRps_3.28 //
GS40yrasprpu:680: sikatayā paripūrya tadardhakaṃ tadanu tatra niveśaya poṭṭalīm // YRps_3.29
GS40yrasprpu:681: upari vālukayā paripūrya tac chagaṇakaiśca puṭaṃ paridīyatām /
GS40yrasprpu:682: dvidaśayāmam athāgnimaho kuru bhavati tena mahārasapoṭalī /
GS40yrasprpu:683: iti mayā kathitā rasapoṭalī balakarā sukarā sukhasiddhidā // YRps_3.30 //
GS40yrasprpu:685: viśadasūtasamo'pi hi gaṃdhakas tadanu khalvatale suvimarditaḥ /
GS40yrasprpu:686: tridinameva hi haṃsapadīrase dinakarasya kareṇa suśoṣitaḥ // YRps_3.31 //
GS40yrasprpu:687: vimalalohamaye dṛḍhakharpare tadanu kajjalikāṃ pratimucya vai /
GS40yrasprpu:688: karamitā sukṛtāpi hi cuhlikā hy upari tatra niveśaya ca bhājanaṃ //
GS40yrasprpu:689: amalalohamayena ca darviṇā rasavaraṃ niyataṃ parimardayet /
GS40yrasprpu:690: tadanu vahnimadhaḥ kuru vai dṛḍhaṃ satatameva hi yāmacatuṣṭayam //
GS40yrasprpu:691: supaca eṣa raso jaladopamo bhavati vallamito madhunā yutaḥ /
GS40yrasprpu:692: kavalitaḥ kṣayarogagaṇāpaho madanavṛddhikaraḥ paramo nṛṇām // YRps_3.34 //
GS40yrasprpu:693: sa ca valīpalitāni vināśayet sakalakuṣṭhavināśakaraḥ paraḥ // YRps_3.35 //
GS40yrasprpu:696: rasavaraṃ vimalaṃ ca suśobhitaṃ saśukapicchasamaṃ parimarditam //
GS40yrasprpu:698: kanakamūlarasena ca pācitaṃ tadanu saptadinaṃ kṛśavahninā // YRps_3.37 //
GS40yrasprpu:699: rasavarasya śubhaṃ hi vipācanaṃ yavamito rasarājavaras tadā /
GS40yrasprpu:700: dinamukhe pratihanti subhakṣitaḥ sakaladoṣakṛtāṃ vikṛtiṃ jayet //
GS40yrasprpu:703: balivasāṃ ca ghṛtena vimardayed atikṛśāgnikṛte dravati svayam // YRps_3.39
GS40yrasprpu:704: tadanu tāmrarasau viniveśyatāṃ trayamidaṃ sarasaṃ ca vimarditam /
GS40yrasprpu:705: drutamayaṃ ca sadāyasabhājane tadanu sūtakṛtāṃ varakajjalīm // YRps_3.40
GS40yrasprpu:707: bhavati sāratamā rasaparpaṭī sakalarogavighātakarī hi sā // YRps_3.41 //
GS40yrasprpu:708: kuru samānakaṭutrayasaṃyutāṃ maricayugmamitāṃ sukhadāṃ sadā // YRps_3.42
GS40yrasprpu:720: āruṣkareṇa sahitā sā tu sidhmavināśinī // YRps_3.48 //
GS40yrasprpu:726: aṣṭādaśa ca kuṣṭhāni nihantyeva na saṃśayaḥ // YRps_3.51 //
GS40yrasprpu:730: śuddhaṃ rasaṃ gaṃdhakameva śuddhaṃ pṛthak samāṃśaṃ kuru yatnatastataḥ /
GS40yrasprpu:731: eraṃḍamūlasya rasena sūtaṃ tathādrikarṇyā svarasena mardayet // YRps_3.53
GS40yrasprpu:732: taṃ kākamācyāḥ svarasena piṣṭvā tathā ca taṃ dāḍimabījatoyaiḥ /
GS40yrasprpu:733: krameṇa sūtaṃ hi dinaiścaturbhiḥ śuddhatvamāyāti hi niścayena // YRps_3.54
GS40yrasprpu:734: tatastu gaṃdhaṃ khalu mārkavadravair vibhāvyamānaṃ kuru lohapātre /
GS40yrasprpu:735: pradrāvayettaṃ badarasya cāgninā praḍhālayed bhṛṃgarase trivāram //
GS40yrasprpu:736: kāryā tataḥ kajjalikā vimardya tāṃ drāvayellohamaye supātre /
GS40yrasprpu:737: praḍhālayettāṃ kadalīdale hi saṃchādya cānyena dalena paścāt // YRps_3.56
GS40yrasprpu:738: tasyās tv adhordhvaṃ pradadīta gomayaṃ śītīkṛtā gavyaghṛtena bharjitā /
GS40yrasprpu:739: rogānaśeṣānmaladoṣajātān hinasti caiṣā rasaparpaṭī hi // YRps_3.57 //
GS40yrasprpu:740: sā jīrakeṇaiva tu rāmaṭhena vātāmaśūlaṃ gṛhaṇīṃ sakāmalām /
GS40yrasprpu:741: gulmāni cāṣṭāvudarāṇi hanyāt saṃsevitā śuddharasasya parpaṭī // YRps_3.58
GS40yrasprpu:742: mayāpi sadvaidyahitāya nūnaṃ pradarśiteyaṃ khalu roganāśinī // YRps_3.59
GS40yrasprpu:745: saṃśoṣya paścādapi hiṃgurājikā- śuṃṭhībhirebhiśca samaṃ vimardya //
GS40yrasprpu:746: rasena sārdhaṃ hi kumārikāyā mūṣāṃ vidadhyādravigharmaśoṣitām /
GS40yrasprpu:747: tasyāṃ nidhāyātha rasasya golakaṃ taṃ sveditaṃ cāmlarasena samyak //
GS40yrasprpu:752: pratirasaṃ ca viśoṣya hi bhakṣayed raktikādvayamitaṃ rujāpaham /
GS40yrasprpu:754: jāyate'dhikataraṃ guṇena vai sannipātabhavamūrcchanaṃ jayet // YRps_3.64
GS40yrasprpu:755: yaḥ śrīsūtavarasya sevanamidaṃ nityaṃ karotīha vai dīrghāyurdhanadhānyadharmasahitaḥ prāpnoti saukhyaṃ param /
GS40yrasprpu:756: loke kīrtiparaṃparāṃ vitanute dharme matirjāyate prānte tasya parā gatirhi niyataṃ satyaṃ śivenoditam // YRps_3.65 //
GS40yrasprpu:759: anubhūtaṃ mayā kiṃcit kiṃcit śāstrānusārataḥ // YRps_4.1 //
GS40yrasprpu:762: tāmraṃ caivāśmasāraṃ ca nāgavaṃgau tathaiva // YRps_4.2 //
GS40yrasprpu:765: ete'ṣṭau dhātavo jñeyā lohānyevaṃ bhavanti hi // YRps_4.3 //
GS40yrasprpu:768: anye trayaḥ suvarṇasya prakārāḥ santi noditāḥ // YRps_4.4 //
GS40yrasprpu:776: rūpyādiyogena yadā miśraṃ svarṇaṃ hi jāyate /
GS40yrasprpu:777: hemakāryaṃ na cettena tadā śodhyaṃ bhiṣagvaraiḥ // YRps_4.7 //
GS40yrasprpu:783: evaṃ puṭatrayaṃ dattvā śuddhaṃ hema samuddharet // YRps_4.10 //
GS40yrasprpu:784: na tu śuddhasya hemnaśca śodhanaṃ kārayedbhiṣak /
GS40yrasprpu:785: anyeṣāmeva lohānāṃ śodhanaṃ kārayed bhiṣak // YRps_4.11 //
GS40yrasprpu:787: tataḥ svarṇabhavaṃ patraṃ tāpitaṃ hi vinikṣipet /
GS40yrasprpu:789: guruṇā kathitaṃ samyak nirutthaṃ jāyate dhruvam /
GS40yrasprpu:790: rogānhinasti sakalān nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // YRps_4.13 //
GS40yrasprpu:794: saṃpuṭe ca tato rundhyāt puṭayeddaśabhiḥ puṭaiḥ /
GS40yrasprpu:795: mriyate nātra saṃdeho nirutthaṃ bhasma jāyate // YRps_4.15 //
GS40yrasprpu:797: hemnaḥ sūkṣmadalāni bhūrjasadṛśānyādāya saṃlepya vai vajrīdugdhakahiṅguhiṅgulasamair ekatra piṣṭīkṛtaiḥ /
GS40yrasprpu:798: satyaṃ saṃpuṭake nidhāya daśabhiścaivaṃ puṭaiḥ kukkuṭaiḥ pācyaṃ hema ca raktagairikasamaṃ saṃjāyate niścitam // YRps_4.17 //
GS40yrasprpu:801: vidrute hemni nikṣiptaṃ svarṇabhūtiprabhaṃ bhavet // YRps_4.17 //
GS40yrasprpu:803: mardayed dinam ekaṃ tu saṃpuṭe dhārayettataḥ // YRps_4.18 //
GS40yrasprpu:805: jāyate nātra saṃdeho raṃjanaṃ kurute dhruvam /
GS40yrasprpu:806: dehaṃ lohaṃ ca matimān sudhanī sādhayedidam // YRps_4.19 //
GS40yrasprpu:808: etatsvarṇabhavaṃ karotica rajaḥ saundaryatāṃ vai sadā rogāndaivakṛtān nihanti sakalānyevaṃ tridoṣodbhavān /
GS40yrasprpu:809: yaḥ seveta naraḥ samān dvidaśakān vṛddhaśca no jāyate doṣāścaiva garodbhavā viṣakṛtā āgantujā naiva hi // YRps_4.20 //
GS40yrasprpu:811: rūpyaṃ ca trividhaṃ proktaṃ khanijaṃ sahajaṃ tathā /
GS40yrasprpu:812: kṛtrimaṃ ca trayo bhedāḥ kathitāḥ pūrvasūribhiḥ // YRps_4.21 //
GS40yrasprpu:814: bhūdhare kutra cetprāptaṃ khanyamāne ca khanijam /
GS40yrasprpu:820: yadrūpyaṃ vahninā taptam ujjvalaṃ hi viniḥsaret /
GS40yrasprpu:821: tacchuddhaṃ kaladhūtaṃ hi sarvakāryakaraṃ param // YRps_4.23 //
GS40yrasprpu:823: tāmrādisaṃsargabhavaṃ tvaśuddhaṃ rūpyaṃ hi miśraṃ khalu doṣalaṃ ca /
GS40yrasprpu:824: tacchodhayedvai bhasitasya mūṣyāṃ sīsena sārdhaṃ rajataṃ tu dhmāpayet //
GS40yrasprpu:826: śanair vidhamyamānaṃ hi doṣaśūnyaṃ prajāyate // YRps_4.25 //
GS40yrasprpu:831: mardayed dinamekaṃ tu satataṃ nimbuvāriṇā // YRps_4.27 //
GS40yrasprpu:833: mūṣāmadhye tu tāṃ muktvā adhordhvaṃ gaṃdhakaṃ nyaset // YRps_4.28 //
GS40yrasprpu:835: pācitāṃ tu prayatnena svāṃgaśītalatāṃ gatām // YRps_4.29 //
GS40yrasprpu:838: anena vidhinā samyak rajataṃ mriyate dhruvam /
GS40yrasprpu:843: puṭādhikyaṃ hi lohānāṃ samyak syād guṇakāri ca /
GS40yrasprpu:851: tāmraṃ cāpi dvidhā proktaṃ nepālaṃ mlecchadeśajam /
GS40yrasprpu:852: nepāladeśajād anyan mlecchaṃ tatkathitaṃ budhaiḥ // YRps_4.35 //
GS40yrasprpu:860: vimardya nimbutoyena tāni patrāṇi lepayet // YRps_4.38 //
GS40yrasprpu:865: tālakena tadardhena śilayā ca tadardhayā // YRps_4.40 //
GS40yrasprpu:868: uparyupari patrāṇi kajjalīṃ ca nidhāpayet // YRps_4.42 //
GS40yrasprpu:870: svāṃgaśītaṃ samuttārya khalve sūkṣmaṃ pracūrṇayet // YRps_4.43 //
GS40yrasprpu:874: tatsamāṃśasya gaṃdhasya pāradasya samasya ca // YRps_4.45 //
GS40yrasprpu:886: śuddhaṃ śulvaṃ gaṃdhakaṃ vai samāṃśaṃ pūrvaṃ sthālyāṃ sthāpayedgaṃdhakārdham /
GS40yrasprpu:887: madhye śulbaṃ sthāpanīyaṃ prayatnāt tasyordhvaṃ vai gaṃdhacūrṇasya cārdham // YRps_4.51
GS40yrasprpu:888: sthālīmukhe cūrṇaghaṭīṃ niveśya lepaṃ tathā saindhavamṛtsnayāpi /
GS40yrasprpu:889: cullyāṃ ca kuryādatha vahnimeva yāmatrayeṇaiva supācitaṃ bhavet //
GS40yrasprpu:890: śītībhūtaṃ doṣahīnaṃ tadeva kṛtvā cūrṇaṃ gālitaṃ vastrakhaṇḍe /
GS40yrasprpu:891: sevyaṃ samyak caikavallapramāṇaṃ kāsaṃ śvāsaṃ hanti gulmapramehān //
GS40yrasprpu:894: pariṇāmabhavaṃ śūlaṃ tathā cāṣṭavidhaṃ ca ruk // YRps_4.53* //
GS40yrasprpu:902: yathottaraṃ syād guṇavarṇahīnaṃ prakāśitaṃ vaidyavareṇa samyak /
GS40yrasprpu:903: kāṃtaṃ tathā tīkṣṇavaraṃ hi muṇḍaṃ lohaṃ bhavedvai trividhaṃ krameṇa //
GS40yrasprpu:905: kāṃtaṃ caturdhā kila kathyate'tra tadromakaṃ bhrāmakacumbake ca /
GS40yrasprpu:906: saṃdrāvakaṃ śreṣṭhatamaṃ tathā hi saṃkathyate śāstravidai rasajñaiḥ //
GS40yrasprpu:909: tebhyo yaddrāvitaṃ lohaṃ romakaṃ tatpracakṣate // YRps_4.59 //
GS40yrasprpu:911: yatra kvāpi girau śreṣṭhe labhyate bhrāmakopalaḥ /
GS40yrasprpu:912: tasmājjātaṃ tu yallauhaṃ bhrāmakaṃ tadihocyate // YRps_4.60 //
GS40yrasprpu:915: na muñcatyeva satataṃ śivabhaktiṃ yathānugaḥ // YRps_4.61 //
GS40yrasprpu:917: himādrau labhyate duḥkhād yaḥ spṛṣṭo drāvayedayaḥ /
GS40yrasprpu:918: suvarṇādīṃśca tadvaddhi tatkāṃtaṃ drāvakaṃ bhavet // YRps_4.62 //
GS40yrasprpu:920: śuddhe kāṃtabhave pātre śṛtaṃ dugdhaṃ hi nodgiret /
GS40yrasprpu:921: pānīyaṃ kvathitaṃ cāsmin hiṃgugaṃdhasamaṃ bhavet // YRps_4.63 //
GS40yrasprpu:923: lepo'pi naiva jāyeta śuddhakāṃtasya lakṣaṇam // YRps_4.64 //
GS40yrasprpu:925: koṭisaṃkhyāguṇaṃ proktaṃ cuṃbakaṃ drāvakaṃ tathā // YRps_4.65 //
GS40yrasprpu:928: kāṃtādisarvalohaṃ hi śudhyatyeva na saṃśayaḥ // YRps_4.66 //
GS40yrasprpu:931: nirvāpitaṃ bhavecchuddhaṃ satyaṃ guruvaco yathā // YRps_4.67 //
GS40yrasprpu:933: lohacūrṇaṃ ghṛtāktaṃ hi kṣiptvā lohasya kharpare /
GS40yrasprpu:935: khalve ca vipacettadvat pañcavāram ataḥ param /
GS40yrasprpu:936: varodakaiḥ puṭellohaṃ caturvāram idaṃ khalu // YRps_4.69 //
GS40yrasprpu:938: anena vidhinā kāryaṃ sarvalohasya sādhanam // YRps_4.70 //
GS40yrasprpu:943: peṣaṇaṃ tu prakartavyaṃ puṭaḥ paścātpradīyate // YRps_4.72 //
GS40yrasprpu:952: mriyate nātra saṃdeho hy anubhūtaṃ mayaiva hi // YRps_4.76 //
GS40yrasprpu:959: baṃgaṃ tu dvividhaṃ proktaṃ khuraṃ miśraṃ tathaiva ca /
GS40yrasprpu:961: yacchuddhaṃ saralaṃ śubhraṃ khuraṃ tadabhidhīyate // YRps_4.79 //
GS40yrasprpu:966: takramadhye trivāraṃ hi miśraṃ baṃgaṃ viśudhyati // YRps_4.80 //
GS40yrasprpu:973: anena vidhinā śeṣam apakvaṃ mārayed dhruvam // YRps_4.83 //
GS40yrasprpu:975: athāparaḥ prakāro hi vakṣyate cādhunā mayā /
GS40yrasprpu:976: śuddhabaṃgasya patrāṇi samānyeva tu kārayet // YRps_4.84 //
GS40yrasprpu:977: ajāśakṛt varā tulyā cūrṇitā ca niśā tathā /
GS40yrasprpu:981: pūrvaṃ prakalpitaṃ cūrṇaṃ tatropari ca vinyaset /
GS40yrasprpu:982: tasyopari ca patrāṇi samāni parito nyaset // YRps_4.87 //
GS40yrasprpu:986: samāṃśaṃ rasasindūram anena saha melayet // YRps_4.89 //
GS40yrasprpu:1001: chede kṛṣṇaṃ guru snigdhaṃ drutadrāvam athojjvalam /
GS40yrasprpu:1002: kṛṣṇavarṇaṃ bahiḥ śuddhaṃ nāgaṃ hitamato'nyathā // YRps_4.95 //

GS40yrasprpu:1562: <kaṅkuṣṭha:: third type from the feces of a newborn elephant>
GS40yrasprpu:1563: vadanti kaṃkuṣṭhamathāpare hi sadyaḥ prasūtasya ca dantinaḥ śakṛt /
GS40yrasprpu:1564: tat kṛṣṇapītaṃ bhavatīva recanaṃ tṛtīyamāhurvibudhā bhiṣagvarāḥ //
GS40yrasprpu:1566: caturthakaṅkuṣṭhamihaiva vājināṃ nālaṃ hi kecitpravadanti tajjñāḥ /
GS40yrasprpu:1567: yaddhastijaṃ śvetamathātipītaṃ virecanaṃ tatprakaroti śīghram // YRps_6.55
GS40yrasprpu:1568: rasāyane śreṣṭhataraṃ rase ca satvena yuktaṃ khalu gauravānvitam /

GS40yrasprpu:1575: sattvākṛṣṭirna ca proktā yasmātsatvamayaṃ hi tat /

GS40yrasprpu:2352: tārasaṃpuṭamadhye tu dhāritaṃ taṃ ca golakam // YRps_11.83 //
GS40yrasprpu:2355: dhānyābhraṃ tulyaṃ paṃkena kṛtvā śrāvaṃ tu pūrayet /
GS40yrasprpu:2357: tāmraṃ dvādaśavallaṃ hi rūpyaṃ valladvayaṃ tathā /
GS40yrasprpu:2358: vaṃgaṃ vallamitaṃ śuddhaṃ sarvamekatra gālayet // YRps_11.86 //
GS40yrasprpu:2360: jāyate pravaraṃ tāraṃ satyam etad udīritam // YRps_11.87 //
GS40yrasprpu:2365: vaṃgaṃ tālakamabhrakaṃ śaśirasaṃ tīkṣṇaṃ viṣaṃ ṭaṃkaṇaṃ /
GS40yrasprpu:2366: traivāreṇa ca mūkamūṣadhamitaṃ vindanti candraprabham // YRps_11.89 //
GS40yrasprpu:2370: pāradasya trayo bhāgā bhāgaikaṃ rajatasya hi /
GS40yrasprpu:2371: nimbūrasena saṃmardya piṣṭīṃ kṛtvā prayatnataḥ // YRps_11.91 //
GS40yrasprpu:2375: tena vedhyaṃ drutaṃ tāmraṃ ṣoḍaśāṃśena yatnataḥ // YRps_11.93 //
GS40yrasprpu:2378: sūtakasya trayo bhāgā baṃgaṃ bhāgadvayaṃ tathā /
GS40yrasprpu:2396: anenaiva prakāreṇa punarevaṃ tu kārayet // YRps_11.103 //
GS40yrasprpu:2398: ṣoḍaśāṃśena śulbasya vedhaṃ kuryānna saṃśayaḥ // YRps_11.104 //
GS40yrasprpu:2400: pāradaṃ ṭaṃkamānaṃ tu lavaṇaṃ dviguṇaṃ tathā /
GS40yrasprpu:2401: khalve vimardayettāvad yāvannaṣṭo raso bhavet // YRps_11.105 //
GS40yrasprpu:2402: tāmraṃ gadyāṇakaṃ śuddhaṃ baṃgaṃ vallamitaṃ kuru /
GS40yrasprpu:2403: drute tāmre'tha lavaṇaṃ sūtakena samanvitam // YRps_11.106 //
GS40yrasprpu:2405: tadrūpye marditaṃ sūtaṃ kṣeptavyaṃ jalayantrake // YRps_11.107 //
GS40yrasprpu:2406: tattrayodaśakaṃ rūpyaṃ jāyate nātra saṃśayaḥ // YRps_11.108 //
GS40yrasprpu:2408: tālena nihataṃ baṃgaṃ tadbaṃgena tu rūpyakam /
GS40yrasprpu:2410: vallaṃ gadyāṇake dadyād baṃgaṃ stambhayate dhruvam // YRps_11.109 //
GS40yrasprpu:2417: kuryāddaradakhaṇḍena samaṃ sīsaṃ ca dāpayet // YRps_11.112 //
GS40yrasprpu:2419: bhasma mūṣopari nyasya dhmāpayecca śanaiḥ śanaiḥ // YRps_11.113 //
GS40yrasprpu:2420: śuddhaśaṅkhanibhaṃ rūpyaṃ niṣkamātraṃ hi niḥsaret // YRps_11.114 //
GS40yrasprpu:2422: dvipalaṃ śuddhasūtaṃ ca dvipalaṃ rasakasya ca /
GS40yrasprpu:2423: tālakaṃ ca paladvaṃdvaṃ surmilaṃ yugmamātrakam // YRps_11.115 //
GS40yrasprpu:2426: kūpīmukhe tu yallagnaṃ sattvaṃ grāhyaṃ prayatnataḥ /
GS40yrasprpu:2429: sūtakaṃ palamekaṃ tu śaṃkhābhaṃ surmilaṃ palam /
GS40yrasprpu:2430: eraṇḍataile ghṛṣṭaṃ tad dhāritaṃ kharpare vare // YRps_11.118 //
GS40yrasprpu:2432: paścāccullyāṃ samāropya vahniṃ kuryācchanaiḥ śanaiḥ // YRps_11.119 //
GS40yrasprpu:2433: sārdhaṃ yāmaṃ tataḥ pācyaṃ svāṃgaśītaṃ samuddharet /
GS40yrasprpu:2434: tāmrapātre tu yallagnaṃ sarvaṃ sattvaṃ samāharet // YRps_11.120 //
GS40yrasprpu:2436: deyaṃ tadvallamātraṃ hi drute tāmre tu sattvakam // YRps_11.121 //
GS40yrasprpu:2437: śaṃkhābhaṃ jāyate tāraṃ nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // YRps_11.122 //
GS40yrasprpu:2439: tālaṃ tāmraṃ rītighoṣaṃ samāṃśaṃ kuryādevaṃ gālitaṃ ḍhālitaṃ hi /
GS40yrasprpu:2440: amle varge saptavāraṃ praḍhālya paścādyojyaṃ tulyabhāge ca rūpye /
GS40yrasprpu:2441: śuddhaṃ rūpyaṃ ṣoḍaśākhyaṃ hi samyak jātaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ nānṛtaṃ satyametat //
GS40yrasprpu:2444: svacche sūtavare vallaṃ nikṣiptaṃ rūpyakṛdbhavet // YRps_11.124 //
GS40yrasprpu:2455: anena vidhinā pūryā dvitīyā mūṣikā śubhā // YRps_11.129 //
GS40yrasprpu:2457: sūtakaṃ bandham āyāti vaṅgābhaṃ tu prajāyate /
GS40yrasprpu:2458: drutadrāvaṃ ghātasahaṃ dṛṣṭamevaṃ mayā khalu // YRps_11.130 //
GS40yrasprpu:2464: mauktikāni hi jāyante kṛtānyevaṃ mayā khalu // YRps_11.133 //
GS40yrasprpu:2467: mauktikāni tu sūkṣmāṇi nimbūdrāve nidhāpayet // YRps_11.134 //
GS40yrasprpu:2469: tasya paṃkasya guṭikāṃ masṛṇāṃ tu prakārayet // YRps_11.135 //
GS40yrasprpu:2471: catvāri kāṃsyabhāṇḍāni caturdikṣu gatāni ca // YRps_11.136 //
GS40yrasprpu:2473: badhyate mauktikaṃ śreṣṭha- taraṃ sarvaguṇairyutam // YRps_11.137 //
GS40yrasprpu:2475: śuddhaśaṅkhasya cūrṇaṃ hi sūkṣmaṃ kṛtvā prayatnataḥ /
GS40yrasprpu:2478: vartiṃ vidhāya matimān kārpāsāsthiṣu svedayet // YRps_11.139 //
GS40yrasprpu:2479: svāṃgaśītaṃ samuttārya pravālaṃ ruciraṃ bhavet // YRps_11.140 //
GS40yrasprpu:2485: kuṃkumaṃ kesaraṃ caiva jātīpatraṃ śatāvarī // YRps_12.2 //
GS40yrasprpu:2487: śṛṅgāṭakaṃ karṣamitaṃ kuryādevaṃ pṛthak pṛthak // YRps_12.3 //
GS40yrasprpu:2489: vaṭakān kārayet paścāt karṣamātrān vipācayet // YRps_12.4 //
GS40yrasprpu:2491: mākṣike ghṛtamāne vai mukhaṃ rundhyāddinatrayam // YRps_12.5 //
GS40yrasprpu:2493: saptakāni ca pañcaivam āhāraṃ madhuraṃ bhajet // YRps_12.6 //
GS40yrasprpu:2494: dugdhaudanaṃ tathā rātrau kṣāramamlaṃ ca varjayet /
GS40yrasprpu:2495: retaḥkṣayī tathā klībo gacchecca pramadāśatam // YRps_12.7 //
GS40yrasprpu:2499: śatāvarīṃ kṣīravidārikāṃ ca prasthārdhamānāṃ pṛthageva kuryāt /
GS40yrasprpu:2500: rasaṃ tathā śālmalimadhyamūlāt prasthaṃ sitārdhāḍhakamatra deyam //
GS40yrasprpu:2501: supācitaṃ vai mṛduvahninā tathā darvīpralepo'pi hi jāyate yathā /
GS40yrasprpu:2502: tvakpatrakailāḥ saha kesareṇa palapramāṇā hi tato vidadhyāt // YRps_12.10
GS40yrasprpu:2503: lehe suśīte madhu bilvamātraṃ prātaḥ prabhakṣediha karṣamātram //
GS40yrasprpu:2506: cūrṇīkṛtaṃ gālitameva vastrād bhṛṣṭaṃ tathājyena sitāsametam // YRps_12.12
GS40yrasprpu:2508: lehaṃ sujātaṃ khalu bhakṣayettat karṣapramāṇaṃ nitarāṃ prabhāte /
GS40yrasprpu:2509: kāmasya bodhaṃ kurute hi śīghraṃ nārīṃ ramedvai caṭakāyate'sau //
GS40yrasprpu:2512: saṃcūrṇya sarvaṃ pṛthageva pālikaṃ kṣīreṇa pācyaṃ daśabhāgakena //
GS40yrasprpu:2513: sitā pradeyā daśapālikātra pākaṃ vidadhyādapi cāgniyogāt /
GS40yrasprpu:2514: madhuplutaṃ bhakṣitamardhayāmāt kāmapradīptiṃ kurute sadaiva // YRps_12.15
GS40yrasprpu:2515: vīryasya vṛddhiṃ jaṭharāgnivṛddhiṃ kāmāgnivṛddhiṃ sahasā karoti //
GS40yrasprpu:2518: jīvakarṣabhakau jīvāṃ medāṃ vṛddhiṃ śatāvarīm // YRps_12.17 //
GS40yrasprpu:2520: rase tasminghṛtaprasthaṃ gavyaṃ daśaguṇaṃ payaḥ // YRps_12.18 //
GS40yrasprpu:2534: dugdhamadhye vipācyainaṃ dinānyevaṃ hi pañca ca // YRps_13.3 //
GS40yrasprpu:2536: guṭikā kolamātrā hi bhakṣaṇīyā niśāmukhe // YRps_13.4 //
GS40yrasprpu:2540: kuṅkumaṃ svarṇabījaṃ ca dhūrtaparṇaṃ prasūnakam // YRps_13.6 //
GS40yrasprpu:2542: godugdhe śodhanīyaṃ ca bhāgamekaṃ prakalpayet // YRps_13.7 //
GS40yrasprpu:2547: jātīphalārkakarahāṭalavaṅgaśuṇṭhīkaṅkolakeśarakaṇāharicandanāni etaiḥ samānamahiphenamanena cābhraṃ śvetaṃ nidhāya madhunā vaṭakān vidadhyāt /
GS40yrasprpu:2548: māṣadvayonmitamamuṃ niśi bhakṣayitvā mṛṣṭaṃ payastadanu māhiṣamāśu pītvā kurvantu kāmukajanāḥ pratiruddhapātāścetāṃsi tāni cakitāni kalāvatīnām //
GS40yrasprpu:2554: yāmārdhaṃ dhārayedbinduṃ satyaṃ guruvaco yathā // YRps_13.13 //
GS40yrasprpu:2556: postakaṃ palamekaṃ vai śuṃṭhīkarṣaḥ sitā palaikā ca /
GS40yrasprpu:2557: karṣamitā tvakpayasā pītaṃ reto dhruvaṃ dhatte // YRps_13.14 //
GS40yrasprpu:2559: sadvaidyena yaśodhareṇa kavinā vidvajjanānandakṛd grantho'yaṃ grathitaḥ karotu satataṃ saukhyaṃ satāṃ mānase // YRps_13.15 //
GS40yrasprpu:2560: deśānāṃ surarāṣṭram uttamatamaṃ tatrāpi jīrṇābhidhaḥ prākāro'sti sa vedaśāstraniratairvipraiśca saṃśobhitaḥ /
GS40yrasprpu:2561: tasmin śaṃbhupadāravindaratikṛcchrīpadmanābhaḥ svayam tatputreṇa yaśodhareṇa kavinā graṃthaḥ svayaṃ nirmitaḥ // YRps_13.16 //
GS40yrasprpu:2562: saṃbodhāya satāṃ sukhāya sarujāṃ śiṣyārthasaṃsiddhaye vaidyānāmupajīvanāya viduṣām udveganāśāya vai /
GS40yrasprpu:2563: śrīmaddurgapurātane 'tinipuṇaḥ śrīpadmanābhātmajaḥ śrīmadbhaṭṭayaśodharaḥ kavivaro granthaḥ svayaṃ nirmame // YRps_13.17 //
